saarthal_expedition_logistics.name: Saarthal Expedition Logistics
saarthal_expedition_logistics.notes:
Tracks the expedition staging → ruins entry → breach.
1=briefed+supplied; 2=arrive; 3=outer wards breached; 4=first draugr; 5=inner threshold reached; 6=Eye chamber (secured for withdrawal).

student_safety_pressure.name: Student Safety Pressure
student_safety_pressure.notes: Ticks when students are put in danger or injured. If filled, Mirabelle disciplines you and/or students are withdrawn.

eye_of_magnus_discovery.name: Eye of Magnus Discovery
eye_of_magnus_discovery.notes:
Progresses from first sighting → containment → transport to College.
At 5, it becomes the College's central crisis.

college_internal_politics.name: College Internal Politics
college_internal_politics.notes:
Tracks tension between factions in the College (Ancano vs traditionalists).
At 8, the College fractures into open conflict.
